amendment.description: An amendment numbered 53 printed in Part B of House Report 118-551 to prohibit the provision of gender transition procedures, including surgery or medication, through the Exceptional Family Medical Program.
amendment.purpose: Amendment prohibits the provision of gender transition procedures, including surgery or medication, through the Exceptional Family Medical Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A029) Agreed to by recorded vote: 218 - 205 (Roll no. 275).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A029) Agreed to by recorded vote: 218 - 205 (Roll no. 275).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
